ABOUT_ME_INFO.INTRO:
Hi, I'm a German-speaking Frontend Developer based near Aachen.
Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT,
I am excited about crafting visually captivating and
intuitive websites and applications.

ABOUT_ME_SKILLS.INFO_1:
Flexible in terms of working environments, I can
work effectively both on-site Aachen and
remotely.
ABOUT_ME_SKILLS.INFO_2:
I am open-minded and always looking for
personal challenges to constantly improve my
knowledge and skills.
ABOUT_ME_SKILLS.INFO_3:
In my profession, programming isn't just about
writing code; it's a creative form of problem-
solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex
technical challenges into simple, user-friendly
solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals
and bring your visions to life.

SKILLS_INFORMATION.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS_INFORMATION.EXPERIENCE:
I have gained experience in building projects
different frontend technologies and concepts.
SKILLS_INFORMATION.MESSAGE:
Feel free to contact me.
I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION:
Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my
skills in action.

SINGLE_PROJECT.DESCRIPTION_1:
Task manager inspired by the Kanban System.
Create and organize tasks and drop functions.
Assign users and categories.
SINGLE_PROJECT.DESCRIPTION_2:
A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an
object-oriented approach.
Help Sharkie to find coins and poison bottles.
Fight against the killer whale.
SINGLE_PROJECT.DESCRIPTION_3:
This App is a Slack Clone App.
It revolutionizes team communication
and collaboration.
Real-time messaging and
robust channel organization.

LEGAL_NOTICE.TITLE: Legal Notice
LEGAL_NOTICE.CONTENT_INFO:
The content of this website has been created with the utmost care.
However, I cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content.
LEGAL_NOTICE.LINKS_INFO:
My portfolio may contain links to external third-party websites. I have no control over the content of
these websites and therefore cannot assume any liability for them.
LEGAL_NOTICE.COPYRIGHT_INFO:
The content and works created by me in this website are subject to copyright law. Any reproduction,
editing, or distribution requires my explicit permission.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INFO2: This Privacy Policy explains how personal data is processed on my portfolio website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SERVER_LOG_INFO:
When visiting this website, certain data is automatically collected by the server and stored in log
files. This includes:
• IP address
• Date and time of access
• Browser type and version
• Operating system
• Referrer URL (previously visited page)
This data is used for technical security and website optimization and is not
linked to individuals.
PRIVACY_POLICY.FONTS_INFO:
This website uses Google Fonts to ensure a consistent and appealing design. Google Fonts are
loaded from Google servers. When accessing these fonts, your browser may
transmit data such as your IP address to Google.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_INFO:
You have the right to:
• Request information about stored personal data.
• Request correction or deletion of your data.
• Object to data processing under certain conditions.
To exercise these rights, please contact me at jessicamanczak@gmx.de.
PRIVACY_POLICY.DATA_SECURITY_INFO: I take appropriate measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access or misuse.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PRIVACY_POLICY_UPDATE:
I may update this Privacy Policy when necessary. The latest version will always be available on this
website.
